聞き分ける: (ききわける) - to recognize by sound (recognise)/to identify by sound; to understand/to be reasonable
聞き及ぶ: (ききおよぶ) - to hear of; to learn of
聞き取る: (ききとる) - to catch (a person's words); to make out; to follow; to understand
聞き合せる: (ききあわせる) - to make inquiries; to refer to
聞き咎める: (ききとがめる) - to find fault with
聞き外す: (ききはずす) - to mishear; to stop listening halfway through
聞き尽くす: (ききつくす) - to hear all about
聞き忘れる: (ききわすれる) - to forget to ask
聞き悪い: (ききにくい) - difficult to hear; hesitating to ask
聞き惚れる: (ききほれる) - to listen to in an ecstasy
聞き慣れる: (ききなれる) - to get used to hearing
聞き捨てならない: (ききすてならない) - inexcusable; unpardonable; can't be allowed to pass (without comment)
聞き捨てにする: (ききずてにする) - to overlook; to ignore; to pass over
聞き捨てる: (ききすてる) - to ignore; to overlook
聞き損なう: (ききそこなう) - to mishear/to fail to catch; to miss (the chance to hear)
聞き方: (ききかた) - way of listening; listener
聞き書: (ききがき) - writing down what one hears; account of what one hears
聞き書き: (ききがき) - writing down what one hears; account of what one hears
聞き正す: (ききただす) - to find out the truth; to ascertain; to clarify; to confirm; to verify
聞き漏らす: (ききもらす) - to fail to hear; to miss
聞き直す: (ききなおす) - to listen again; to ask again
聞き知る: (ききしる) - to learn something through hearing
聞き糺す: (ききただす) - to find out the truth; to ascertain; to clarify; to confirm; to verify
聞き納め: (ききおさめ) - hear something for the last time
聞き耳を立てる: (ききみみをたてる) - to prick up one's ears and listen; to listen attentively
聞き良い: (ききよい) - pleasant to listen to
聞き苦しい: (ききぐるしい) - difficult to hear; unpleasant to hear
聞き茶: (ききちゃ) - tea tasting/tea-tasting; tea-tasting contest
聞き落し: (ききおとし) - mishearing; failing to catch (something said)
聞き落す: (ききおとす) - to fail to catch
聞き覚え: (ききおぼえ) - learning by ear; memory of having heard something before
聞き覚えがある: (ききおぼえがある) - to have heard somewhere; to sound familiar
聞き覚える: (ききおぼえる) - to be familiar; to learn by ear/to pick up knowledge
聞き質す: (ききただす) - to find out the truth; to ascertain; to clarify; to confirm; to verify
聞き辛い: (ききづらい) - difficult to hear; difficult to ask
聞き込み: (ききこみ) - getting information (esp. by interviewing witnesses, etc. in a police investigation)
聞き込み捜査: (ききこみそうさ) - (police) legwork; house-to-house inquiry; canvassing; investigation carried out by questioning neighbours, bystanders, etc.
聞き込む: (ききこむ) - to get information; to find out; to get wind of
聞き返す: (ききかえす) - to listen repeatedly/to listen again; to ask a question in return; to ask again/to ask for a repeated explanation
聞き逃す: (ききのがす) - to fail to hear something/to miss; to act as if one didn't hear something/to let a remark slide
聞き過ごす: (ききすごす) - to fail to catch; to ignore
聞き過す: (ききすごす) - to fail to catch; to ignore
聞き酒: (ききざけ) - sake tasting; wine tasting
聞き飽きる: (ききあきる) - to be tired of hearing
聞き香: (ききこう) - smelling incense; savoring incense; distinguishing incense by smell; incense-smelling party
聞き馴れる: (ききなれる) - to get used to hearing
聞き齧る: (ききかじる) - to have a smattering knowledge of
聞く: (kiku) - to hear; to listen (por exemplo, para música) , to hear; to listen (e.g. to music); to ask, to enquire, to query; to learn of, to hear about
聞くと見るとは大違い: (きくとみるとはおおちがい) - A big difference between what one hears and what one sees
聞くは一時の恥聞かぬは末代の恥: (きくはいっときのはじきかぬはまつだいのはじ) - Better ask than go astray
聞く耳: (きくみみ) - acute ear; good ear
聞く耳をもたない: (きくみみをもたない) - to turn a deaf ear to; to not listen to; to not get the message
聞く耳をもたぬ: (きくみみをもたぬ) - to turn a deaf ear to; to not listen to; to not get the message
聞く耳を持たない: (きくみみをもたない) - to turn a deaf ear to; to not listen to; to not get the message
聞く耳を持たぬ: (きくみみをもたぬ) - to turn a deaf ear to; to not listen to; to not get the message
聞こえよがし: (きこえよがし) - bad-mouthing someone so as to be deliberately overheard; intentionally letting someone hear insults or sarcasm regarding them
聞こえる: (きこえる) - to be heard/to be audible; to be said to be/to be reputed
聞こし召す: (きこしめす) - to hear; to drink
聞付ける: (ききつける) - to hear/to catch (the sound of something); to hear about (rumour, etc.)/to overhear/to learn of (something); to get used to hearing
聞入る: (ききいる) - to listen attentively to; to be lost in
聞入れる: (ききいれる) - to grant (a wish); to accede; to comply with; to heed
聞分ける: (ききわける) - to recognize by sound (recognise)/to identify by sound; to understand/to be reasonable
聞取る: (ききとる) - to catch (a person's words); to make out; to follow; to understand
聞外す: (ききはずす) - to mishear; to stop listening halfway through
聞慣れる: (ききなれる) - to get used to hearing
聞損なう: (ききそこなう) - to mishear/to fail to catch; to miss (the chance to hear)
聞書: (ききがき) - writing down what one hears; account of what one hears
聞書き: (ききがき) - writing down what one hears; account of what one hears
聞法: (もんぽう) - hearing the teachings of Buddha
